attributes.action: Award the Southport Survivors for their bravery and strength
attributes.additional_details: The situation makes me and many others very emotional. The lives of three young children were taken, and their families lives ruined forever. Many children and adults in the attack prevented more lives being taken owing to their bravery and I truly think this needs to be commended, not only for them, but also in the memory of Elsie, Alice and Bebe.
attributes.background: The Southport attacks shocked the world, and the bravery of both children and adults to help save other within the dance class need to be recognised and awarded.

rejection.details:
Dear Jessica,

I hope you are well and thank you for your petition.

Unfortunately, we are unable to accept your petition as we cannot accept petitions that ask for someone to be given an honour, such as an award. If you would like to nominate someone for an honour you can do so here: http://www.gov.uk/honours/

Kind regards,

The Petitions Committee Team
